txt.en: 'Some restless soldiers are in need of a new opponent with whom they can sharpen their skills before the coming battle. I've heard your name whispered between citizens and soldiers alike, boasting of your prowess in battle and helpful demeanour. Will you aid us, [placeholder]?'
Talk to Harnion in the Training Ground about sparring with his soldiers.
With the Enemy looming close, the soldiers of Minas Tirith are on edge from anticipation.
'Are you ready to aid the soldiers in their training?'
